name: Love and Zombies (yamsy) (yamsy)
description:
Dear Cupid,

Welcome to your first week on the job! Don't forget - the survival of the human race depends on you!

Love, Aphrodite

CONTROLS
WASD to move, SPACE to jumpHold MOUSE to slow time and aim your arrow, and RELEASE to shoot
Shoot two beings consecutively to pair them -- try to find the correct matches based on your instructions from Aphrodite!Press P to pause, change mouse sensitivity, toggle background music, restart the level, or return to the main menu.
Press I to open Aphrodite's daily instructions.

Game created by Maya Prebish, Selin Yuksel and Janelle Chen for CS3450 Game Programming with Professor Caglar Yildirim at Northeastern University, Spring semester 2022.
